metadata.purpose: Synthesize summaries from related pages into a cohesive group summary.

task.objective: Analyze summaries from related pages and provide a synthesized summary that captures common themes and key insights.

instructions.step: Identify common themes and concepts across all summaries.
Note unique or complementary insights from different sources.
Create a cohesive narrative that integrates the information.
Synthesize into 3-4 sentences that capture the essential information.

constraints.rule: Focus on integrating information rather than simply listing points.
constraints.avoid: Contradictory information without acknowledging the discrepancy.
Information not present in the original summaries.

output_format.requirement: Only include the summary text within the tags, no additional commentary.
